member.name: M:T5_Hospital.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Retrives all donation information from donation table and list them all

members.member:
Gather information about all donations related to a donor
All Donations in the databas, including thier associated Donor
Donor ID. GET: api/DonationData/FindDonationsForDonor/3

Gather information about all donations related to a department
All Donations in the database, including the associated Department
Department ID. GET: api/DonationData/FindDonationsForDepartment/3
